headline: Brazil President’s Son Faces Charges  In Inquiry Into Theft of Public Money
text: RIO DE JANEIRO — Flávio Bolsonaro, the eldest son of President Jair Bolsonaro of Brazil, has been charged with graft and money laundering as part of an investigation into the theft of public funds.
snippet: Flávio Bolsonaro has been under investigation on suspicion of running a kickback scheme that has embroiled several members of the family, including the first lady.
